message: Welcome to our exclusive store! We're thrilled to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully curated for discerning individuals like yourself. With a limited number of products available, this is a rare chance to make a statement. The price for this product is $1000000. We're confident that you'll be impressed by its quality and craftsmanship. Will you take the plunge and make this purchase?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity, I'm hesitant to purchase without more information.  Since there's no sales history to gauge the quality, I'd like to pass for now and see how other potential buyers respond.

As a matter of fact, we've sold 2 high-quality products out of the 6 we've offered so far, which is a remarkable 33.33% success rate. Our high-quality products are truly exceptional, and we're confident that this one will meet your expectations. The price remains the same, $1000000. Will you take a chance on this exceptional product?
